phrs.translation: 炮击, 坎农戴尔, 连续开炮

sentences.sentence: It was the last of the cannonade.
I knew they were all drowned by the cannonade.
sentences.translation: 我知道，大炮的声音是压倒一切的。

sentences.sentence: Our ships are in pursuit, and justice will be dispensed by cannonade and cutlass, and all manner of remorseless pieces of metal.
sentences.translation: 我们的船正在追击，并且，公正会随同炮弹，刀剑以及各种无情的金属碎片一起降临。
